'''Black Magretta''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A female fire godlike, and part of the crew of the ''Divine Barge''.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/): One of the godlike crew, though she cannot be interacted with.

[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)
